page.title: 04COBERLEY: ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: Coberley village is a small one, with only 80 people in it. Some have lived there all their lives, others are newcomers.The village has very little entertainment but they do have a barn dance, fete, country lunch each year. The barn dance is fun and everybody enjoys it. It allows people from other villages to enjoy it too. The country lunch is held at Coberley scjool. You pay money to the school to play games at the country lunch. The fete is seemingly like the country lunch, but it has more people and different stalls. At the fete there is a majority of adults in charge of the stalls, but in the country lunch the children operate it. In the village there is a church which has services each week and also there is a Sunday school.
